summary: Nena, a girl from the south of Italy, has to travel far from home to get her first job as a teacher. She is sad, not because she has to leave her mother and sister, with whom everything is ... See full summary Â»
cast: Isabella Ragonese|Francesco Chiarello|Alberto Boll|Miriana Protopapa|Rita Schirinzi|Bianca Maria Stea Lindholm|Vijaya Bechis Boll|Antonio Fumarola|Antonia Cecere
title: Il primo incarico
